posts.cooked:
We’re releasing the Signal 7.62 beta soon.

If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group here.

Using Obtanium? Remember to opt-in for pre-release tags to receive beta updates.

Share your feedback on the latest changes:

  • More backup fixes
  • New message screen - large screen support prep

Complete list of new commits since 7.61.3:
https://github.com/signalapp/Signal-Android/compare/v7.61.3…main

Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.61 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.62.0 (160400)

Builds will no longer be published to Firebase App Distribution

44 new commits since 7.61.3:

Show commits

  • Only consider backup5 for link and sync. [1]

  • Prevent invalid profile keys from being processed for storage service. [2]

  • Add ability to cancel a pending vote. [3]

  • Add poll icon when quoting a poll. [4]

  • Add snackbar host to AppScaffold. [5]

  • Fix auto-expansion of panes on click. [6]

  • Add CallQualitySurvey proto. [7]

  • New conversation v2 - Implement remaining functionality. [8]

  • Enable split pane UI for new conversation screen. [9]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.59.2 [10]

  • Show sheet for validation error. [11]

  • Adding various poll UI updates. [12]

  • Update UI when viewing votes. [13]

  • Utilize height size class when dealing with landscape orientations. [14]

  • Do not hide navigation rail when performing multi-select in conversation list. [15]

  • Ensure multiselect restarts as necessary on call log fragment. [16]

  • Clear keyboard focus when entering multiselect mode. [17]

  • Fix pane anchor for detail only offset. [18]

  • Allow detail content to slide with pane as we remove it. [19]

  • Utilize fixed rounded corner sheet for recipients fragment. [20]

  • Fix crash when opening archived chats. [21]

  • Remove deprecated view model factory. [22]

  • Fixes for reaction overlay. [23]

  • Add initial Call Quality UX. [24]

  • Display back button when the conversation pane is expanded. [25]

  • Fix read more button on stories. [26]

  • Update recovery key education sheet. [27]

  • Fix chat folder creation in large font sizes. [28]

  • Disable password manager suggestions on new conversation search box. [29]

  • Make optional RecipientPicker callbacks opt-in by splitting into smaller interfaces. [30]

  • Add "fake" chat list bitmap to fake transition. [31]

  • Standardize internal UI state property naming. [32]

  • Update dark colors for reaction overaly. [33]

  • Fix e2e test. [34]

  • Persist stored vertical insets between activity restarts. [35]

  • Fix RTL issue with phone number in settings. [36]

    Fixes #14239
    Resolves #14387

  • Fix browser not opening in certain contexts. [37]

    Fixes #14368
    Resolves #14388

  • Fix incorrect navigation to RestoreActivty after app cold start. [38]

  • Fix margin on call log item. [39]

  • Add split-pane UI for create group screen. [40]

  • Update reproducible build script to handle acceptable resource differences. [41]

    Fixes #13565

  • Fix invalid navigation to remote restore activity post registration. [42]

  • Update translations and other static files. [43]

  • Bump version to 7.62.0 [44]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Android v7.61.3…v7.62.0

Localization changes

Note: after clicking a link, it may take a few seconds before GitHub jumps to the file (try scrolling a bit if it doesn’t).

67 languages changed since 7.61.3:

link_counts.title: Get the latest Android releases even faster with Firebase App Distribution

posts.name: Jeffrey
posts.cooked: No Download button yet.

posts.name: Talya (she/her)
posts.cooked:
happened in the previous release but considering the new build is (still) not on GitHub and that i’m not seeing any commit that would address this…

got this visual glitch again when scrolling down (to see if there’s more messages where there weren’t) while at the bottom of the chat. background replaces with message colour gradiant.
not sure what was the trigger to make it happen, but once it did i could reproduce consistently up until i scrolled back up, at which point the glitch disappeared.
i used to have this glitch with the same randomness in the past.

Screenshot_20251023-082937_Signal720×1419 109 KB

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.61.3/d1986992e3125296b2dca2afdac21415092329460f7abb6a9790df13eaa54c12

posts.name: AlertSubject
posts.cooked:
Long standing bug I can’t always reproduce

When taking a picture, the viewfinder and the end result don’t match

The viewfinder shows less than what the actual picture ends up being - see example

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.61.3/d78b654bdeadfaea52c44ee2dc162ffca535a006f481afb22e43359cb0bb9143
Where can I read more about the new conversation screen? And conversations v2? Are there screenshots of this change?
The “new message” screen was rebuilt in preparation for large screen support. Let us know if you notice any issues! There are no user facing changes yet, so it should look and function the same.

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked:
https://debuglogs.org/android/7.62.0/fb3500d187c3c382d279b82c891d16a2d90b36103fcfc620a5c9a49c6f89a8ad

Still getting the banner asking me to renew my subscription :(

posts.name: Jeremy
posts.cooked: Is it just me or when I go to subscribe to backups it doesn’t ask which Google account it will use? This is on the previous version but I don’t see a fix…but I could be wrong.

I’ve had this problem for as long as I can remember, definitely not new on 7.62. I’m running 7.61.3, and can reproduce it every time I open the camera from a chat.

EDIT:

In my case, the fastest way to reproduce this is to rotate the phone into landscape.

7.62.0 logs: https://debuglogs.org/android/7.62.0/ca6e50f15a4c99e98d6d2328186529a9fce276661f39a595b351b581a2c17129

posts.name: Salt
posts.cooked:
The overlay which displays when you long press on a message is much lighter in this beta:

Stable

signal-2025-10-24-11-46-07-3231024×1705 56 KB

Beta

signal-2025-10-24-11-44-51-5691024×1468 71.1 KB

Not sure if this is intentional, but wanted to note the change just in case.

Logs: https://debuglogs.org/android/7.62.0/3425dec9a74bf234c6b4f0ba6225d84de46bffb4eb90c6fb86822716dd477929

posts.name: Talya (she/her)
posts.cooked:
seems to have been intentional.

alex-signal

link_counts.title: Fixes for reaction overlay. · signalapp/Signal-Android@6e0bfa2 · GitHub

posts.name: Greyson Parrelli
posts.cooked:
Salt505:

The overlay which displays when you long press on a message is much lighter in this beta

Intentional, we’ve been using the wrong theme color for those colors :p

jeremymasters:

it just me or when I go to subscribe to backups it doesn’t ask which Google account it will use? This is on the previous version but I don’t see a fix…but I could be wrong.

It doesn’t ask. I believe the google pay system uses the google account that was used to install the app from the play store. I’m not sure if we can change that or not?

posts.name: Jeremy
posts.cooked: Thanks for taking a moment to reply. I definitely didn’t install the signal app from this Google account. It wasn’t on my phone at the time.

Still can’t restore my backup I created on the testflight beta unfortunately. It didn’t crash this time though just sends me back to the restore screen asking if I want to use backups or skip

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.62.0/8e9393ddfc1d06b19a4f641a1b3933d956a67cc11bb8940404a40e26bcb77dcb

Not sure if this is a regression, but citing a file only message looks wrong:

Screenshot_20251025-1210301080×1030 84.3 KB

posts.cooked:
I don’t think this should be happening

Any chance it can be removed to not cause issues?

My chat list was empty for a split second before it loaded again https://debuglogs.org/android/7.62.0/545f31f8481f9639c8d89e3fa822568caf2f35978694ffacb089e2878f3d4041
